feed.title: Podsync Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Podsync: v2.4.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • aaf8e09 Add config.toml.example (fix #269 #194)
  • 142b0e0 Add server package
  • 3690018 Allow custom youtube-dl path
  • 43c44fc Allow specify string as API key
  • 5483455 Decouple config package
  • 26f4b2a Fix context import
  • 1c2e374 Fix data path in docker compose file
  • db4de62 Migrate to pelletier/go-toml
  • a5c6e2d Move cron section to docs
  • 0edf283 Notify when using log file (fix: #224)
  • 12cdbf6 Refactor code to allow pluggable storages
  • 16315c0 Update docker compose (close: #270)
  • 34c708d readd WORKDIR /app config.toml uses relative path, from the current directory, $PWD by default is /.

entry.title: New release for Podsync: v2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix shutdown server context cancel error by @laraws in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/281
  • Fix cover art quality config and default being ignored by @Contextualist in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/288
  • add support to set feed as private by @matejdro in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/295
  • Support S3-compatible provider as storage backend by @Contextualist in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/317
  • Fix nil pointer dereference for cron by @Contextualist in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/319
  • Fix page_size limited at 50 on YouTube by @Th0masL in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/320
  • Fix two regressions introduced by PR #317 by @Contextualist in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/324
  • Override the default link by @JohannesHoppe in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/333
  • Readme: instructions for local build & debugging by @JohannesHoppe in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/334
  • Use yt-dlp instead of youtube-dl by @Th0masL in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/318
  • Added detail about go being a dependency by @tvqt in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/370
  • Clean up episodes before generating XML feed by @Contextualist in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/368
  • feat: added custom format support by @Harnas in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/442

Dependencies

  • Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 2.8.0 to 2.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/273
  • Bump actions/setup-go from 2.1.5 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/279
  • Bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/282
  • Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 2.8.1 to 2.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/283
  • Bump actions/checkout from 2.4.0 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/286
  • Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 2.9.0 to 2.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/284
  • Bump actions/setup-go from 2.2.0 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/285
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 2.3.1 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/287
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.0 to 1.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/292
  • Bump github.com/pelletier/go-toml from 1.9.4 to 1.9.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/298
  • Bump docker/login-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/304
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.1 to 1.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/316
  • Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 2.9.1 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/314
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.30 to 1.44.33 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/321
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.33 to 1.44.34 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/323
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.2 to 1.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/330
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.34 to 1.44.38 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/329
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.4 to 1.7.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/335
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.38 to 1.44.41 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/336
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.5 to 1.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/340
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.41 to 1.44.50 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/346
  • Bump github.com/sirupsen/logrus from 1.8.1 to 1.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/359
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.50 to 1.44.60 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/361
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.60 to 1.44.97 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/406
  • Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 3.0.0 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/392
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.97 to 1.44.103 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/412
  • Bump github.com/zackradisic/soundcloud-api from 0.1.5 to 0.1.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/413
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.103 to 1.44.109 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/419
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.109 to 1.44.114 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/425
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.114 to 1.44.115 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/426
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.115 to 1.44.116 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/427
  • Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 3.1.0 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/428
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.8.0 to 1.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/433
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.116 to 1.44.121 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/434
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.121 to 1.44.122 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/436
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.122 to 1.44.128 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/445
  • Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.128 to 1.44.144 by @dependabot in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/461

New Contributors

  • @laraws made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/281
  • @Contextualist made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/288
  • @Th0masL made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/320
  • @JohannesHoppe made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/333
  • @tvqt made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/370
  • @Harnas made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/pull/442

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mxpv/podsync/compare/v2.4.2...v2.5.0

entry.title: New release for Podsync: v2.6.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 081dfbd Add S3 prefix support (#498)
  • 24166c4 Add max_age filter to skip old episodes
  • 2552a6c Add min and max duration filter
  • 748084d Add nightly build job
  • d871db8 Add option to enable debug mode in config.toml
  • 79634a3 Bump actions/setup-go from 3 to 4
  • b86b8f0 Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2
  • 2e7d99a Bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.0.0-20180620175406-ef147856a6dd to 0.6.0
  • 2500587 Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.0.0-20220722155255-886fb9371eb4 to 0.1.0
  • 90912c2 Bump gopkg.in/natefinch/lumberjack.v2 from 2.0.0 to 2.2.1
  • f969164 Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 3.2.0 to 4.1.0
  • 8c19c32 Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0
  • 6fed6da Create how_to_setup_podsync_on_synology_nas.md
  • 52fe94f Fix S3 setting name in example
  • 5c29072 Fix nightly tag
  • 5b7ddeb Publish nightly builds (fix: #394)
  • 453484a Rebase with main
  • 4ebdc47 Remove helper
  • a546bbf Rename vars
  • 947ac53 Rework release
  • 76985c5 Update cloud_formation.yml
  • 70f64c5 Update docs/how_to_setup_podsync_on_synology_nas.md
  • 675845d Update docs/how_to_setup_podsync_on_synology_nas.md
  • 6bdd009 Update docs/how_to_setup_podsync_on_synology_nas.md
  • 7d18be9 Use Env Vars to build and push Docker Images, bump golangci-lint to v1.50.1
  • c8b4aa2 run gofmt

entry.title: New release for Podsync: v2.6.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • dd551d9 Include docker image links in release notes

Docker images

docker pull ghcr.io/mxpv/podsync:latest

entry.title: New release for Podsync: v2.7.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 3aee543 Add TLS support
  • 49b707c Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4
  • 719aefa Bump actions/setup-go from 4 to 5
  • a043e26 Bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4
  • bb584f0 Bump docker/build-push-action from 4 to 5
  • 9cc74a2 Bump docker/login-action from 2 to 3
  • dc3f2f7 Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2 to 3
  • 31bf0c2 Bump github.com/sirupsen/logrus from 1.9.0 to 1.9.3
  • 92bb248 Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0
  • ebffa3a Bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.6.0 to 0.9.0
  • 33b0204 Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.1.0 to 0.6.0
  • 75873a7 Bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 3 to 4
  • 92fdff3 Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 4 to 5
  • a0df050 Fix goreleaser config
  • 391489a Fix tests and lints
  • 4a9eafd Fix version tag when releasing docker images
  • 7a81903 Replace deprecated function calls
  • 145abe1 Update dependecines and Go version
  • d8e042a Update golangci-lint
  • cffd002 Update release notes formatting

Docker images

docker pull ghcr.io/mxpv/podsync:v2.7.0 docker pull ghcr.io/mxpv/podsync:latest
